text: Holloway Road is a station on the London Underground. It is on the Piccadilly Line between Caledonian Road and Arsenal stations, and in Travelcard Zone 2. The station opened on 15 December 1906. ==References== ==Other websites== * London's Transport Museum Photographic Archive ** ** ** ** * Pictures of the disused staircase * More photographs of Holloway Road station Category:Piccadilly line stations Category:Tube stations in the London Borough of Islington Category:Railway stations opened in 1906
title: Holloway Road tube station
